name: rereading
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of reading something again, for the second, third, etc. time: His rereading of Dickens revealed numerous mentions of the drink "grog". A re-reading of his work suggests that he predicted the future with incredible accuracy. It takes time for a child to make connections between the pictures and the story, and that's why rereading is important. Related word
